modifiers.name: Fortifications
modifiers.description: Objects created by Behemoths have increased health.

modifiers.name: Combustion
modifiers.description: Behemoths' physical attacks set Slayers on fire.

modifiers.name: Deep Freeze
modifiers.description: Frost damage is increased. Player stamina costs are increased.

modifiers.name: Desperation
modifiers.description: Behemoths are unable to enter rage. Once below half health, they become enraged until defeated.
